quotes.quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.

quotes.cite: Martin Conway, 1st Baron Conway of Allington
quotes.quote: Each fresh peak ascended teaches something.
Being fresh is more important than having money.
Tomorrow is always fresh, with no mistakes in it yet.
You can make a fresh start with your final breath.
True creativity is fresh, but not always original.
Every fresh morning brings freshness of sacred-being.
You have to reinvent to stay fresh, to stay in the game.
The fresh start is always an illusion but a necessary one.
Humility is really important because it keeps you fresh and new.
Continuity does not rule out fresh approaches to fresh situations.
Every day is a fresh beginning, Every morn is the world made new.
To keep the air fresh among words is the secret of verbal cleanliness.
Fresh, solid ideas feel like gifts to writers, therefore every morning is Christmas.
Fresh air is good if you do not take too much of it; most of the achievements and pleasures of life are in bad air.
Love is always fresh as morning dew.
A fresh pair of eyes can often find problems.
One new feature or fresh take can change everything.
Freshness is essential. That makes all the difference.
Everybody deserves a fresh start every once in a while.
Fresh activity is the only means of overcoming adversity.
Fresh water is like a fossil fuel; we should not waste it.
Every fresh acquirement is another remedy against affliction and time.
You don't have to worry about what happened last year; you can start fresh.
A child's world is fresh and new and beautiful, full of wonder and excitement.
Every fresh experience points out some form of error which we shall afterwards carefully avoid.
Start a painting with fresh ideas, and then let the painting replace your ideas with its ideas.
We can't change anything until we get some fresh ideas, until we begin to see things differently.
Regardless of how badly you handled yesterday, today provides a fresh opportunity to do things right!
You have to stay fresh and blank in your mind when you go out to bat. You complicate things, and you're gone.
My life's purpose is to write poetry - but behind the poetry must be the vision of a fresh revelation for men.
The greatest power you possess in life is your understanding that life gives you a fresh start any moment you choose.
